lead_paragraph: A picture caption last Sunday with an article about Bloomberg L.P.’s new player-evaluation software for Major League Baseball teams switched the order of several members of the group that developed it. The picture showed, from left, Stephen Orban; Bo Moon; Daniel L. Doctoroff, the Bloomberg L.P. president; Angela Sun; and Jay B. Lee. The caption also gave an erroneous job description for Ms. Sun. She is Mr. Doctoroff’s chief of staff, not one of the engineers who developed the software.
